name: floating
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not fixed in one position, place, or level: floating population The city has a large floating population (= people who move around a lot).floating interest rate The bank has offered us a loan with a floating interest rate.
medical
  specialized used to refer to a part of the body that is out of its usual position, or not connected to another part of the body: a floating rib
